# Wierzba, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship

Wierzba  () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Ruciane-Nida, within Pisz County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland. It lies approximately  north of Ruciane-Nida,  north-west of Pisz, and  east of the regional capital Olsztyn.
